1.text: To the chief Musician upon Neginah, A Psalm of David. Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.

2.text: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.

3.text: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.

4.text: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.

5.text: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.

6.text: Thou wilt prolong the king's life: and his years as many generations.

7.text: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.

8.text: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
